summary: This document is a series of official inmate count sheets from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It records the census of inmates in various housing units, totaling 776 individuals. The document is significant as it provides administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held prior to his death.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, recording a total census of 776 inmates across various housing units.

keyFacts: The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The count was conducted on July 23, 2019, recording a total inmate census of 776 individuals.
The document shows administrative procedures for verifying inmate counts, but the names of the officials preparing and taking the count are not provided in the text.
This type of record establishes the routine prison operations at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated.
